text:
I really love the beta! Much more aeye ppealing and cleaner than the current one. Really love the "What's new" section - just one quick thing about the navigation(first page):
It would be extremly benefitial/time saving if there would be quicklinks or so like in the screenshot(I've just made that up to visualize)

Also - since it seems to be narrower than the current version(i know the container is wider), would a lightbox feature for images be an thing?
